title: Narcostaat
overview: In the drug industry, tens of billions go around, there are fatalities, civil servants are bribed, drug waste is dumped and there is eager consumption of more and more users. Who are the people behind the headlines and news items? They speak in this series. People from the upper and the underworld. Anonymous criminals - who normally seek shade - now talk freely. Danny Ghosen speaks to the agents who hunt for them or experts who know a lot about the illegal world. And he talks to victims of the growing drug violence.A fascinating and urgent report of the threatening situation in which the Netherlands has ended up.
